description: Valid examples of basic action definitions

examples.quantum_code:
<q:action name="submitContact" method="POST">
  <q:param name="email" type="email" required="true" />
  <q:query datasource="db">
    INSERT INTO contacts (email) VALUES (:email)
  </q:query>
  <q:redirect url="/thank-you" />
</q:action>

<q:action name="deleteProduct" method="DELETE">
  <q:param name="id" type="integer" required="true" />
  <q:query datasource="db">
    DELETE FROM products WHERE id = :id
  </q:query>
  <q:redirect url="/products" flash="Product deleted!" />
</q:action>

<q:action name="updateProfile" method="PUT">
  <q:param name="username" type="string" minlength="3" maxlength="20" required="true" />
  <q:param name="age" type="integer" min="18" max="120" />
  <q:query datasource="db">
    UPDATE users SET username=:username, age=:age WHERE id=:userId
  </q:query>
  <q:redirect url="/profile" flash="Profile updated!" />
</q:action>
